experience.title: Software Engineer Intern, Baum Family Maker Space, USC | Los Angeles, CA
experience.overview: Developed software solutions for access control, real-time visualization, and automation, enhancing operational efficiency and security within the maker space.
applications: 1. Developed an automated RFID door access system using React, TypeScript, Node.js, and MongoDB – reducing manual access management efforts by 90% and detecting 200+ unauthorized access attempts.
2. Created a real-time visualization tool with Python, Pandas, Matplotlib, and Plotly – cutting facility wait times by 35% and increasing equipment availability by 20%.

3. Designed and implemented AUSCAS v2.0, a UML-based data management system with RESTful API integration and Google Apps Script – reducing logging errors by 60% and improving workflow efficiency by 50%.
4. Optimized 3D printing job scheduling with a predictive prioritization system – improving job completion efficiency by 50% across 1,200+ print jobs annually.
extras: 1. Developed a Grasshopper plugin in C# (using K4AdotNet) for real-time point cloud and depth image processing – enhancing 3D modeling efficiency by 40%.
2. Engineered an AR sandbox system using the Orbbec SDK in Python – enabling millimeter-level accurate depth map processing for 100+ architecture students.
3. Offloaded intensive computational tasks to GPU using OpenGL and Vulkan – reducing CPU load by 60% and improving real-time rendering performance.
4. Led a Python data analytics pipeline to visualize student footfall using Orbbec and Kinect sensors – reducing energy costs by 15% and optimizing space utilization by 30%.

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern, Alien Attorney | Atlanta, GA
experience.overview: Engineered AI-driven automation solutions for legal processes, document retrieval, and recommendation systems, enhancing efficiency in legal workflows.
applications: 1. Engineered an AI-driven legal form automation platform with React-Redux, Flask, and MongoDB, reducing form completion time by 40%.
2. Designed and deployed a vector search-enabled legal document retrieval system with MongoDB Atlas and OpenAI API, cutting manual classification efforts by 60%.
3. Integrated CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions and Docker, automating deployment and reducing deployment time by 25%.
4. Designed and implemented a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) pipeline using OpenAI API and MongoDB Vector Search, improving legal document classification accuracy to 85%.
5. Facilitated synthetic legal document generation with Faker and custom scripts, producing 1,500+ forms, accelerating LLM fine-tuning by 50% using AWS Lambda and TensorFlow.
6. Developed an LLM-powered restaurant recommendation system by leveraging vector embeddings and user preference clustering, increasing personalized recommendation accuracy by 30%.
extras: 1. Conducted research on optimizing RAG pipelines for legal document classification, improving inference speed by 20%.
2. Developed internal tools for AI model explainability using SHAP and LIME, enhancing transparency in legal AI decisions.

experience.title: Web Development Intern, Kontaktsource | Remote
experience.overview: Developed and optimized website features, improving user engagement, SEO rankings, and dynamic content integration.
applications: 1. Embedded a real-time LinkedIn feed on the website, enabling dynamic content updates and increasing user engagement by 30%.
2. Optimized website architecture, reducing page load time by 20% and boosting SEO rankings by 25%.
3. Developed a membership site with WordPress MemberPress, allowing users to subscribe and access exclusive content.
4. Enhanced the Kontaktsource website’s functionality and user experience.
5. Utilized HubSpot for managing website analytics and customer interactions, improving engagement.
extras: 1. Designed an automated email marketing workflow using HubSpot, boosting customer retention by 15%.
2. Conducted A/B testing on different UI elements to optimize conversion rates.

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern, Divytech Blockchain LLP | Mumbai, IN
experience.overview: Developed blockchain-based digital coupon solutions, leveraging NFTs to improve accessibility and brand engagement.
applications: 1. Led innovative digital coupon distribution for 10 prominent brands, eliminating physical coupon production, with anticipated cost savings of 15% and heightened brand engagement potential upon application launch.
2. Improved coupon accessibility and extended validity through collectible NFTs, fostering brand-consumer connections.
extras: 1. Researched and implemented off-chain storage solutions for NFT metadata using IPFS, improving transaction efficiency.
2. Developed an Ethereum gas optimization strategy, reducing smart contract deployment costs by 30%.

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern, Masterbridge
experience.overview: Developed an NFT-gated marketing platform and an AI-powered phishing detection system, enhancing security and brand engagement in Web3.
applications: 1. Led the development of an NFT-gated marketing platform using React, Express, Node.js, MongoDB, and Solidity, increasing brand engagement by 20% and improving user retention through seamless Web3 interactions.
2. Implemented automated testing with Chai and Mocha to validate smart contracts, reducing bugs by 30%, improving deployment reliability by 15%, and accelerating iteration cycles.
3. Directed a team of 4 in the development of a phisher detection model using Graph Convolutional Networks (GCN) and PyTorch, improving threat detection accuracy by 25% for cryptocurrency networks.
4. Developed an innovative NFT marketplace, enabling designers to monetize unique artworks as NFTs, integrating ERC-20 tokens and alternate tokens to create a dynamic digital art community.
extras: 1. Designed a Web3 identity verification module using Polygon ID, improving authentication security.
2. Developed a decentralized escrow smart contract for NFT transactions, increasing user trust.
